Coverage increased (+0.04%) to 49.456% when pulling **07ca23115acb00fc58e56ec039723838877884b7 on langtutengbywang:master** into **34b085dfbe603c096a43a86c058d25f6cd54a945 on apache:master**.

Hi. I had met the same trouble. The cause is that because I compiled rocketmq with JDK11, but running rocketmq in JDK8. 
In JDK11(in fact since JDK9) ByteBuffer.flip() returns a ByteBuffer. BUT It used to return a Buffer in JDK8.
You can look at the link https://github.com/plasma-umass/doppio/issues/497 to get more info. 
Hope can help you.

@duhenglucky  I add some code review comments.

IMO, we need to merge this pull to develop branch. Starting threads right away and opening logging file does not fit semantics of async log appender, which generally interprets "do NOT block main work thread and fulfill your business at its convenient time".

> ... 45 more
> 
> 请问是Algorithm HmacSHA1不可用的原因是什么？
> PS: rocketmq的版本是4.4.0

我解决了这个问题，问题在于Algorithm HmacSHA1这个算法是在${JAVA_HOME}/jre/lib/ext文件夹下的sunjce_provider.jar,所以需要将此目录增加到CLASSPATH中，注意如果启动脚本使用`-Djava.ext.dirs`，这个参数会将默认的ext覆盖掉，如果使用这个参数，注意将${JAVA_HOME}/jre/lib/ext追加到后面。
大佬解决这个问题的思路是啥，膜拜
@aftersss it means that the Server is very busy to resolve the stacked requests, so retrying at this time will increase the pressure on the server, so fast failure is a good choice.

> 大佬解决这个问题的思路是啥，膜拜

公司使用的rocketmq 3.X，需要增加一个鉴权功能，然后参考4.4+版本，给3.x版本增加了acl功能，目前已经做好了，中间踩了坑，这个是其中一个坑。出现问题了，就看异常，搜索，思考，排查，定位，修改，解决，常规套路。

@wlliqipeng could you retweet your post in dev and user mail list firstly? It would be helpful if you could give more eyes on how to build community as the Apache RocketMQ Community done before(such as apache way.).

@gavinWithGu 

https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-spring/blob/master/rocketmq-spring-boot-samples/rocketmq-consume-demo/src/main/java/org/apache/rocketmq/samples/springboot/consumer/StringConsumerNewNS.java

如果你的consumerlistener使用默认的nameserver (即， application.properties中属性rocketmq.nameServer定义的值)，则不需要再@RocketMQMessageListener中指定nameServer属性； 如果一定要指定这个属性， 则这个属性值必须要与默认的nameserver取值不同。

另外，建议这个issue在 https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-spring 子项目中提出，可能会帮助更多的朋友。

在4.5版本中如果想使用 subscribe(String topic, String fullClassName, String filterClassSource) 的方式使用自定义的方式过滤消息是不是不会起作用，如果是有替代方案么？

I encountered the same problem. Under _HOST_ networking mode, all dockers managed by Rancher are with the same docker0 IP, which is 172.17.0.1.  Thus, RemotingUtil.getLocalAddress() always returns "172.17.0.1" for those dockers, which leads to collision between consumers with the same pid, if using default "IP@pid" clientId. 

- RocketMQ client Version: 4.3.2
- Rancher Version: 1.16.10
- Docker Version: 18.09.5
@huanwei This is a known problem in the docker container if we deploy mutl-docker containers in the one machine.

@caigy @huanwei if used Rancher to manage container, all docker will always return  "172.17.0.1" when getLocalAddress, not only in bridge model, but also in host model, so I think it may be an issue caused by Rancher,  so you can temporarily solve this problem by setting the instanceName.
That's known issue caused by Rancher container network. Setting different instanceName should solve this problem, just as @duhenglucky suggested.
@vancefantasy more test would be fine. I just wonder machineid may be the null case? why add other processid logic followed.

RocketMQ system topic began with "RMQ_SYS" or "rmq_sys".
Hi @mrttx  ,can I join you in dingding talk or wechart?

@duhenglucky  there is nothing to do with The RocketMQ console. Actually, the broker receive the topic config data from the RocketMQ console  correctly, the broker serialize the data as Class RegisterBrokerBody (by json format)， and send to the name server. But the name server deserialize the data as Class  TopicConfigSerializeWrapper(by json format),  the error happens.

@yiwuxia It seems to be redundant here, this code is not very elegant, and can be polished, the issue only used for the bug report and feature request，If you have some questions, please use our mailing list(https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/) there are many users will help you.
I will close this issue, please feel free to reopen it if you have more question.

@KobeWangBeabloo 目前开源版本暂时没有提供导出功能，如果有兴趣的话，可以提个PR，为社区用户提供此功能，我们会帮助你完成这个PR。另外，issue只用于bug 报告以及新特性申请，如果有什么需要帮助的，麻烦在邮件列表（https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/）里面咨询，很多小伙伴会帮助你的。

@duhenglucky 
> https://github.com/travis-ci/travis-ci/issues/10428
消息比较大的情况下haTransferBatchSize设置太小就容易出现这个异常

> 消息比较大的情况下haTransferBatchSize设置太小就容易出现这个异常

嗯，haTransferBatchSize太小会增加slave reportSlaveMaxOffset的频率，也会提前触发doWaitTransfer中的waitForRunning 5次，然后导致返回FLUSH_SLAVE_TIMEOUT

@chyaz the error caused by dLegerPeers config, you should use format like this:  {dLegerSelfId}-{peerHostIP}:{peerPort}, and you may config: dLegerPeers = n1-{host1}:40911;n2-{host2}:40911;n3-{host3}:40911
Could you please move this PR to the develop branch?

Coverage decreased (-0.1%) to 50.534% when pulling **b6b9e0f88ead46383c63da6a6f1332df05c7b9e1 on chenxubiao:patch-2** into **40c255d6b55b03fbff8cd7c1d78af6f5edcab5fa on apache:master**.

@duhenglucky @ShannonDing 

The error occurred because Travis-CI using an `OpenJDK 11.0.2` building environment, `jdk_switcher` is no longer exists in this building environment. Specify an `Oracle JDK 8` building environment could fix that.

I only fixed Travis-CI Java 8 building environments in `.travis.yml` at b567f35, other changes like modify documents or update `README.md` were completed by Alibaba Group staff.

It's better to merge this pull request to `master` branch. After that, merge branch`master` into `develop` to get latest changes.

> @chyaz the error caused by dLegerPeers config, you should use format like this: {dLegerSelfId}-{peerHostIP}:{peerPort}, and you may config: dLegerPeers = n1-{host1}:40911;n2-{host2}:40911;n3-{host3}:40911
thanks
两个生产者使用不同的instanceName就可以了
这个问题主要关注IO和内存。iostat、和store.log中的[NOTIFY]日志，查看内存耗时。io可以使用deadline。最主要还是机器性能，之前由于虚拟问题，io、内存影响特别大。

I have alreay verified some case below.For example,

(1)Execute the updateAclConfig mqadmin command to update some acl config element:
sh mqadmin updateAclConfig -n XX.XX.XX.XX -c DefaultCluster -a RocketMQ -s 1234567809123 -t topicA=DENY,topicD=SUB -g groupD=DENY,groupB=SUB

(2)Excuete the clusterAclConfigVersion to query the acl config file's version:
sh mqadmin clusterAclConfigVersion -n XX.XX.XX.XX:9876 -b XX.XX.XX.XX:10911

(3)Execute the updateAclConfig mqadmin command to create some acl config element:
sh mqadmin updateAclConfig -n XX.XX.XX.XX:9876 -b XX.XX.XX.XX:10911 -a RocketMQ -s 123456780912345 -w 192.168.0.* -t topicA=DENYm,topicD=SUB
